trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the paging-related properties of a data-bound control (such as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>) that allow it to perform paging.
trans-unit.target: 封裝的分頁相關屬性的資料繫結控制項 (例如<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref>，和<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref>)，讓它可以執行分頁。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The PagedDataSource class encapsulates the properties that allow data-source controls, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>, to perform paging.
trans-unit.target: PagedDataSource 類別會封裝，屬性，讓資料來源控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>，若要執行分頁。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This class is used by control developers when providing paging support to a custom data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別是由控制項開發人員使用，提供分頁支援自訂的資料繫結控制項時。

trans-unit.source: This class uses the best available method to enumerate over the data belonging to the current page.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會使用可用的最佳方法來列舉屬於目前頁面的資料。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying data source supports indexed access (such as <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName>), this class uses it.
trans-unit.target: 如果基礎資料來源支援索引的存取 (例如<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName>)，這個類別會使用它。</xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it uses the enumerator created by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會使用列舉值所建立<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>方法。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of PagedDataSource, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需 PagedDataSource 的執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource>的新執行個體使用這個建構函式

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowCustomPaging%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowPaging%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowServerPaging%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.CurrentPageIndex%2A>|0| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.PageSize%2A>|10| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.VirtualCount%2A>|0|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowCustomPaging%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowPaging%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowServerPaging%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.CurrentPageIndex%2A>|0| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.PageSize%2A>|&10; | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.VirtualCount%2A>|0|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.VirtualCount%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.PageSize%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.CurrentPageIndex%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowServerPaging%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowPaging%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowCustomPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether custom paging is enabled in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否在資料繫結控制項中啟用自訂分頁。

trans-unit.source: Use the AllowCustomPaging property to indicate whether custom paging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: AllowCustomPaging 屬性可以用於表示是否已啟用自訂分頁。

trans-unit.source: Custom paging is an optional type of paging provided specifically by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 自訂分頁是選擇性的特別所提供的分頁類型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET version 2.0 data-bound control (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>) uses server-side paging and does not support custom paging.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 2.0 版資料繫結控制項 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>) 會使用伺服器端分頁，並不支援自訂分頁。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Custom paging and server-side paging are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: 自訂分頁和伺服器端分頁會互斥。

trans-unit.source: If you set AllowCustomPaging to `true`, be sure that <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowServerPaging%2A> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將設定 AllowCustomPaging `true`、 確定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowServerPaging%2A>設`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowServerPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom paging, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowCustomPaging%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關自訂分頁的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowCustomPaging%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowCustomPaging%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if custom paging is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果啟用自訂分頁;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether paging is enabled in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否在資料繫結控制項中啟用分頁。

trans-unit.source: Use the AllowPaging property to specify whether a data-bound control has paging enabled.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 AllowPaging 屬性來指定資料繫結控制項是否擁有分頁已啟用。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET version 2.0 data-bound controls (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>) also use server-side paging to provide automatic paging functionality.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 2.0 版資料繫結控制項 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>) 也使用伺服器端分頁提供自動分頁功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information on server-side paging, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowServerPaging%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關伺服器端分頁的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowServerPaging%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowServerPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, you can also provide your own custom paging logic.
trans-unit.target: 當使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項，您可以提供您自己的自訂分頁邏輯。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: For more information on custom paging, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowCustomPaging%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowCustomPaging%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關自訂分頁的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowCustomPaging%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowCustomPaging%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowCustomPaging%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowCustomPaging%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about paging support for data-bound controls, see the `AllowPaging` property of the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 如需資料繫結控制項的分頁支援的詳細資訊，請參閱`AllowPaging`資料繫結控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if paging is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果啟用分頁。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether server-side paging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用伺服器端分頁。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET version 2.0 data-bound controls (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>) provide automatic paging functionality through server-side paging.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 2.0 版資料繫結控制項 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>) 提供自動的分頁功能，透過伺服器端分頁。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: When using an ASP.NET 2.0 data-bound control, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ASP.NET 2.0 資料繫結控制項，此屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Server-side paging and custom paging are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 伺服器端分頁和自訂分頁會互斥。

trans-unit.source: If you set AllowServerPaging to `true`, be sure that <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowCustomPaging%2A> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將設定 AllowServerPaging `true`、 確定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowCustomPaging%2A>設`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowCustomPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if server-side paging is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用伺服器端分頁。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from the data source to the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, starting at the specified index in the <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 將所有項目從資料來源複製到指定<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>中指定索引處開始， <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to copy the contents of the data source into the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法，將資料來源的內容複製到指定<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>指定索引處開始，。</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> is often used to iterate through the items in the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>通常用來逐一查看資料來源中的項目。</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> that receives the copied items from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>接收複製的項目從資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The first position in the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> to receive the copied contents.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的第一個位置<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>接收複製的內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items to be used from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得從資料來源使用的項目數。

trans-unit.source: Use the Count property to determine the number of items to be used from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Count 屬性來判斷要從資料來源使用的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The value returned depends on whether paging is enabled and whether custom paging is used.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的值取決於是否啟用分頁，以及是否使用自訂分頁。

trans-unit.source: - If paging is disabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsPagingEnabled%2A> property to `false`), the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSourceCount%2A> property is returned.
trans-unit.target: -如果已停用分頁 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsPagingEnabled%2A>屬性`false`)，值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSourceCount%2A>會傳回屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSourceCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsPagingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If paging is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsPagingEnabled%2A> property to `true`) and custom paging is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsCustomPagingEnabled%2A> property set to `true`), the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.PageSize%2A> property is returned.
trans-unit.target: -如果啟用分頁 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsPagingEnabled%2A>屬性`true`)，且已啟用自訂分頁 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsCustomPagingEnabled%2A>屬性設定為`true`)，值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.PageSize%2A>會傳回屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsCustomPagingEnabled%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsPagingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If paging is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsPagingEnabled%2A> property to `true`) and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsLastPage%2A> property is set to `false`, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.PageSize%2A> property is returned.
trans-unit.target: -如果啟用分頁 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsPagingEnabled%2A>屬性`true`) 和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsLastPage%2A>屬性設定為`false`，值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.PageSize%2A>會傳回屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsLastPage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsPagingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If paging is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsPagingEnabled%2A> property to `true`), custom paging is disabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsCustomPagingEnabled%2A> property `false`), and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsLastPage%2A> property is set to `true`, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSourceCount%2A> property is subtracted from the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.FirstIndexInPage%2A> property before it is returned.
trans-unit.target: -如果啟用分頁 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsPagingEnabled%2A>屬性`true`)，已停用自訂分頁 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsCustomPagingEnabled%2A>屬性`false`)，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsLastPage%2A>屬性設定為`true`的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSourceCount%2A>屬性會減去的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.FirstIndexInPage%2A>屬性傳回之前。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.FirstIndexInPage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSourceCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsLastPage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsCustomPagingEnabled%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsPagingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSource%2A> property contains `null`, 0 is returned.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSource%2A>屬性包含`null`，就會傳回 0。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of items to be used from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 從資料來源使用的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the current page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前頁面的索引。

trans-unit.source: Use the CurrentPageIndex property to specify or determine the index of the current page.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 CurrentPageIndex 屬性來指定，或判斷目前頁面的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the current page.
trans-unit.target: 目前頁面的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataSource property to specify or determine the data source being paged.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 DataSource 屬性來指定，或判斷正在呼叫資料來源。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> implemented object that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>實作物件，代表資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料來源中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataSourceCount property to determine the number of items in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DataSourceCount 屬性來判斷資料來源中的項目數。

trans-unit.source: If custom paging or server-side paging is used, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.VirtualCount%2A> property is returned; otherwise, the total number of items in the data source is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用自訂分頁或伺服器端分頁，則值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.VirtualCount%2A>會傳回屬性; 否則傳回的資料來源中的項目總數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.VirtualCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSource%2A> property contains `null`, 0 is returned.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSource%2A>屬性包含`null`，就會傳回 0。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The data source is not an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> implemented object.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源不是<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>實作物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the first record displayed on the page.
trans-unit.target: 取得第一個頁面上顯示的記錄的索引。

trans-unit.source: Use the FirstIndexInPage property to determine the index of the first item on the current page.
trans-unit.target: 使用 FirstIndexInPage 屬性來判斷目前的頁面上的第一個項目索引。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsPagingEnabled%2A> property is set to `false`, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsCustomPagingEnabled%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowServerPaging%2A> properties are set to `true`, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSource%2A> property contains `null`, 0 is returned.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsPagingEnabled%2A>屬性設定為`false`，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsCustomPagingEnabled%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowServerPaging%2A>屬性會設為`true`，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSource%2A>屬性包含`null`，就會傳回 0。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowServerPaging%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsCustomPagingEnabled%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsPagingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the first record displayed on the page.
trans-unit.target: 頁面上顯示第一個記錄的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> implemented object that contains all items in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>實作物件，其中包含資料來源中的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> that can be iterated through to get each item in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來建立<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>，可以取得資料來源中的每個項目反覆執行透過。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To access the item at the current position in the enumerator, use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取目前列舉值位置的項目，請使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move to the next item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>移至下一個項目，集合中的方法。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To move the enumerator to its initial position, use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要將列舉值移到它的初始位置，使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you initially get the enumerator or use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection, you must call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您一開始取得列舉值或使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，將列舉值移至第一個項目在集合中，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the item represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 否則，項目會由<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>未定義屬性。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> implemented object that contains all items in the data source.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>實作物件，其中包含資料來源中的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that represents the properties on each item used to bind data.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref> ，代表用來將資料繫結每個項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the GetItemProperties method to create a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the properties on each item used to bind data.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立使用 GetItemProperties 方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection?displayProperty=fullName>，代表用來將資料繫結每個項目的屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSource%2A> property is `null` or is not a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList?displayProperty=fullName> implemented object, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSource%2A>屬性是`null`或不是<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList?displayProperty=fullName>實作物件，`null`傳回。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the GetItemProperties method, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetItemProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 GetItemProperties 方法的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetItemProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetItemProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects that contains the list name returned.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>傳回物件，其中包含清單名稱。

trans-unit.source: This can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that represents the properties on each item used to bind data.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref> ，代表用來將資料繫結每個項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the list.
trans-unit.target: 傳回清單的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This method does not apply to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不適用於這個類別。

trans-unit.source: This method is inherited from <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList?displayProperty=fullName> and is not applicable to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法繼承自<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList?displayProperty=fullName>，而且不適用於這個類別。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It has been implemented to return <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> for all cases.
trans-unit.target: 傳回已實作<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>所有案例。</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects that contains the list name returned.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>傳回物件，其中包含清單名稱。

trans-unit.source: This can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> for all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>所有案例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether custom paging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否已啟用自訂分頁。

trans-unit.source: Use the IsCustomPagingEnabled property to determine whether custom paging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 使用 IsCustomPagingEnabled 屬性來判斷是否已啟用自訂分頁。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsPagingEnabled%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowCustomPaging%2A> properties must be `true` for this property to return `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 同時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsPagingEnabled%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowCustomPaging%2A>屬性必須是`true`這個屬性來傳回`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowCustomPaging%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsPagingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if custom paging is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果啟用自訂分頁;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current page is the first page.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前的頁面第一頁。

trans-unit.source: Use the IsFirstPage property to determine whether the current page is the first page.
trans-unit.target: 使用 IsFirstPage 屬性來判斷目前的頁面是第一頁。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current page is the first page; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果目前的頁面是第一頁。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current page is the last page.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前的頁面最後一頁。

trans-unit.source: Use the IsLastPage property to determine whether the current page is the last page.
trans-unit.target: 使用 IsLastPage 屬性來判斷目前的頁面是否為最後一頁。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current page is the last page; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果目前的頁面是最後一頁。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether paging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否啟用分頁。

trans-unit.source: Use the IsPagingEnabled property to determine whether paging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 使用 IsPagingEnabled 屬性來判斷是否啟用分頁。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowPaging%2A> property must be `true` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.PageSize%2A> property cannot be set to 0 for this property to return `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowPaging%2A>屬性必須是`true`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.PageSize%2A>屬性無法設定為 0，此屬性以傳回`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if paging is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果啟用分頁。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data source is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出資料來源是否為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: This property is implemented to always return `false`, which indicates that the data source can be modified in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個屬性永遠傳回`false`，表示可以修改在所有情況下的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> for all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>所有案例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether server-side paging support is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否啟用伺服器端分頁支援。

trans-unit.source: Server-side paging is enabled when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowPaging%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowServerPaging%2A> properties are both set to `true`, and the amount of data retrieved by the data source cannot be displayed in a single page.
trans-unit.target: 啟用伺服器端分頁時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowPaging%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowServerPaging%2A>屬性都設定為`true`，且無法在單一頁面中顯示的資料來源擷取的資料量。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowServerPaging%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if paging is enabled and server-side paging is indicated using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowServerPaging*> property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果啟用分頁，且使用指示伺服器端分頁<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowServerPaging*>屬性，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.AllowServerPaging*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the data source is synchronized (thread-safe).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出資料來源的存取是否為同步 （安全執行緒）。

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> class and is overridden to always return `false` to indicate that this class is not thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性衍生自<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>類別並覆寫成一律會傳回`false`來指示此類別不具備執行緒安全。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the IsSynchronized property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 IsSynchronized 屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>介面。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> for all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>所有案例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of pages necessary to display all items in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得顯示資料來源中的所有項目所需的總頁數。

trans-unit.source: Use the PageCount property to determine the number of pages necessary to display all items in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用 PageCount 屬性來判斷資料來源中顯示所有項目所需的頁面數目。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSource%2A> property is `null`, 0 is returned.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSource%2A>屬性是`null`，就會傳回 0。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsPagingEnabled%2A> property is set to `false` or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSourceCount%2A> property is set to 0 or less, 1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsPagingEnabled%2A>屬性設定為`false`或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSourceCount%2A>屬性設定為 0 或更少，則傳回 1。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.DataSourceCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource.IsPagingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of pages necessary to display all items in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 顯示資料來源中的所有項目所需的頁面數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of items to display on a single page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在單一頁面上顯示的項目數。

trans-unit.source: Use the PageSize property to specify or determine the number of items to display on a single page.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用的 PageSize 屬性來指定，或判斷要在單一頁面上顯示的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of items to display on a single page.
trans-unit.target: 若要在單一頁面上顯示的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得可用以同步存取集合的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object returned in this implementation is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource> object itself.
trans-unit.target: 在此實作中傳回的物件是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource>物件本身。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.SyncRoot%2A>屬性，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>介面。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 物件，可用來對集合進行同步存取。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the virtual number of items in the data source when custom paging is used.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料來源中的虛擬項目數目，使用自訂分頁時。

trans-unit.source: Use the VirtualCount property when custom paging or server-side paging is used to determine the virtual number of items in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷資料來源中的項目虛擬數目使用自訂分頁或伺服器端分頁時，請使用 VirtualCount 屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the VirtualCount property, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.VirtualItemCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 VirtualCount 屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.VirtualItemCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.VirtualItemCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The virtual number of items in the data source when custom paging is used.
trans-unit.target: 虛擬使用自訂分頁時，資料來源中的項目數目。
